article_title: The sun sets on another Bristol Rhythm & Roots Reunion
article_text:

og.description: Some of the weekend’s largest crowds cheered and hollered for festival headliners Steve Earle and Delbert McClinton Sunday as the curtain came down on the 2015 Bristol Rhythm & Roots Reunion.
